working_hours.title: Working Hours Policy
working_hours.content: Our standard working hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday. We offer flexible working arrangements including remote work options and flexible start times between 8:00 AM and 10:00 AM.

leave_policy.title: Leave and Time Off Policy
leave_policy.content: Employees are entitled to 25 days of annual leave, 10 days of sick leave, and 3 days of personal leave per year. Leave requests should be submitted at least 2 weeks in advance through the HR portal.

dress_code.title: Dress Code Policy
dress_code.content: We maintain a business casual dress code. Professional attire is required for client meetings. Casual Fridays allow for more relaxed clothing. Please avoid overly casual items like shorts, flip-flops, or clothing with inappropriate graphics.

remote_work.title: Remote Work Policy
remote_work.content: Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Remote workers must maintain reliable internet connection, professional workspace, and be available during core business hours (10 AM - 3 PM).

technology_use.title: Technology and Internet Usage Policy
technology_use.content: Company technology should be used primarily for business purposes. Limited personal use is acceptable during breaks. Prohibited activities include accessing inappropriate content, downloading unauthorized software, or sharing confidential information.

anti_harassment.title: Anti-Harassment and Non-Discrimination Policy
anti_harassment.content: We maintain a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, discrimination, or inappropriate behavior. All employees have the right to a respectful workplace. Report any incidents to HR immediately through our confidential reporting system.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality and Data Protection Policy
confidentiality.content: Employees must protect confidential company information, client data, and intellectual property. This includes not sharing login credentials, securing physical documents, and following data handling procedures outlined in security training.

social_media.title: Social Media Policy
social_media.content: When posting about work or representing the company online, maintain professionalism and respect. Do not share confidential information, customer data, or proprietary content. Clearly distinguish personal opinions from company positions.

expense_reimbursement.title: Expense Reimbursement Policy
expense_reimbursement.content: Business expenses will be reimbursed with proper documentation and pre-approval for amounts over $100. Submit expense reports within 30 days with original receipts. Approved categories include travel, meals, training, and supplies.

professional_development.title: Professional Development Policy
professional_development.content: We support employee growth through training, conferences, and skill development programs. Annual budget of $2,000 per employee for approved learning opportunities. Discuss development goals with your manager during quarterly reviews.

parking.question: Where can I park?
parking.answer: Employee parking is available in the covered garage on levels 2-4. Use your employee ID card for access. Visitor parking is on level 1.

lunch_schedule.question: What are the lunch break times?
lunch_schedule.answer: Lunch breaks are typically 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM, but can be flexible based on team needs and workload. Coordinate with your manager and team.

payroll.question: When is payday?
payroll.answer: Employees are paid bi-weekly on Fridays. Direct deposit is available and recommended. Contact payroll@company.com for any payroll questions.

benefits_enrollment.question: When can I enroll in benefits?
benefits_enrollment.answer: Benefits enrollment begins on your start date and must be completed within 30 days. HR will schedule a benefits orientation session during your first week.

it_support.question: How do I get IT support?
it_support.answer: Submit IT tickets through the company portal or email itsupport@company.com. For urgent issues, call the IT helpdesk at extension 1234.
